about_the_game:
Misled Madness is a side-scroller platforming game where the player is attempting to complete deadly obstacle courses and survive with their life as the grand prize. In the game, the player will be able to jog, sprint, jump, wall jump, and die.... a lot. The current obstacles the player must avoid include circular saw blades, Pendulum styled swinging axes and spikes scattered around the courses.

While the casual player can play just for fun to avoid obstacles, more competitive players have the ability to speed run through the levels and gain a ranking on global leaderboards in an attempt to have the fastest times per course.

The player is also able to customize their character to give a more personalized feeling when playing the game. Camera settings allow the player to adjust their view to better suit their preferred playstyle.

content_descriptors.notes: The player will constantly be subjected to various hazards that kill the player and spray blood and dismember the player's body in a non-realistic fashion.

name: Misled Madness

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 10
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 7 5800x
  • Memory: 32 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia RTX 3060
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 10
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 7 5800x
  • Memory: 32 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia RTX 3060
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: Side-scroller platformer where you avoid hazards and race to the finish line for the fastest leaderboard times.
